title: Magic POAP Dispenser
confirmDeleteDispenser:
Are you sure you want to delete your QR Dispenser?

This cannot be undone, but you can always create a new QR Dispenser following the same simple steps you used to make this one.
succesDeleteDispenser:
Deletion success!

Your QR Dispenser has been deleted.

Click OK to be redirected to the home page.
deletionCancelled: Deletion cancelled, your event still exists.

description.pre: This link is intended to be displayed on a physical device, or through a screenshare during a stream.

input.label: Your public QR Dispenser link
input.info: This link takes you to your QR Dispenser page. For example, you can display this page on an iPad at your check-in desk.

notavailable.title: This QR dispenser will become available once the curation team approves your event.
notavailable.description: You will receive an email when your event is approved. This email will also send you the manual claim links in a links.txt file. You don't have to use them, but it is ok to use them in combination with this QR dispenser.

deleteDispenser.title: Secret Admin Section
deleteDispenser.description: Want to create a new QR dispenser for this drop? Delete this QR dispenser first, and then create a new dispenser when you are ready.

adminDispenser.title: Admin link
adminDispenser.description: Your admin link is yours to make changes to this instance of the magic POAP dispenser. Don't share this with anyone!

input.label: Your secret admin link
input.info: The link to this admin page, the page you are seeing now. This link allows you to delete your QR Dispenser. Keep it secret!

adminDispenser.clipboard: Copy secret admin link to clipboard
